analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sani dassana ttika citta saha bhū duka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham citta sahabhum dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ no citta sahabhū dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate cha
